name: 5 HP
rules: This card starts with 5 HP when defending.

name: Focus
rules: This card requires a Focus roll.

name: Auto
rules: This card resolves immediately after being revealed in a play.

name: Max 1
rules: You can only resolve 1 card with this tag per round.

name: Stay
rules: You can keep this card in your play area at the end of a round.
